ygData.subject: Re: Beachcomber and Redhot
ygData.msgSnippet: Beachcomber nods, but he noticed they had drawn their guns, that wasnt good. He flailed his arms to try and get them to calm down.

Beachcomber nods, but he noticed they had drawn their guns, that wasnt
good. He flailed his arms to try and get them to calm down.
______________________________________________________________________
Cliffjumper was aiming. "Ready, aim...." But was interupted by
Firedrill. "No Cliffjumper." He shouted. A sheet of glass descended out
of his helmet and over his eyes. The picture he was looking through
began to zoom in, and record areas of energy, like guns on Redhot's
shoulders, underground veins of oil and other sources, and then zoomed
in and identified Beachcomber. "It's Beachcomber," He said extatically.
He then zoomed in on the other, "and he's with a seeker," he paused,
"With an Autobot symbol?" He said with confusion. Cliffjumper sighed. He
was to rash, and almost filled a friend full of holes. "You guys wait
here, I'll see whats happening." He said, transforming, and quickly
accelerating to his max speed up the hill.
